hero.title: Building a skilled, adaptable, and inclusive workforce
hero.description: Access employment services, benefits, and support programs that help Americans succeed

ei.title: Unemployment Insurance
ei.description: Temporary financial assistance while you look for work or upgrade your skills
ei.details: Unemployment Insurance (UI) provides temporary income support to unemployed Americans while they look for work or upgrade their skills. Regular benefits are available to individuals who lose their job through no fault of their own and have accumulated enough insurable hours.

oas.title: Social Security
oas.description: Monthly payment for seniors 65 years of age and older
oas.details: Social Security is a monthly payment available to most Americans 65 years of age or older. The amount you receive depends on your work history and contributions.

cpp.title: Retirement Benefits
cpp.description: Contributory retirement pension program for American workers
cpp.details: Retirement Benefits form one part of America's retirement income system. They provide basic retirement, disability, and survivor benefits.

jobSearch.title: Job Search
jobSearch.description: Find employment opportunities across the United States
jobSearch.details: Search thousands of jobs, explore labor market trends, and access career planning tools to help you find your next opportunity.

benefitsFinder.title: Benefits Finder
benefitsFinder.description: Discover what government benefits and services you may be eligible for
benefitsFinder.details: Answer a few simple questions to get a personalized list of federal, state and local benefits and services you may be eligible to receive.

chat.title: Ask EVA
chat.subtitle: Employment Virtual Assistant
chat.placeholder: How can I help you today?
